original_title: Erich Wolfgang Korngold: The Adventures of a Wunderkind
overview: This stirring documentary explores the fascinating life and works of Oscar winner Erich Wolfgang Korngold, the celebrated composer of lauded film scores for The Adventures of Robin Hood and The Prince and the Pauper. In addition to the profile of Korngold, the program also features a selection of the composer's concertos for cello and violin as performed by the Frankfurt Radio Symphony Orchestra.
title: Erich Wolfgang Korngold: The Adventures of a Wunderkind
